channel.title: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?
channel.description: [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img337/8996/bullseye.png[/img] You can see clearly that an eyeball is inside an eye that the player actually sees. I doubt that this is intended, and it seems bullsquid's eye position was changed very shortly before release, so that might contribute to this... bug? I saw this on maxed-out video settings. @EDIT Now I am thinking that this could be the eye gib that falls from bullsquid (I didn't gib any bullsquid yet so I'm just guessing that), but nevertheless it looks awkward.

item.title: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
Well, if it’s necessary for engine to look around, why couldn’t they make the inner eyeball invisible?

Read full topic
item.source: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?

item.title: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
one of the “eyeballs” seem to be specular mapping, hence why they change position unrealative to the actual eye

same bug happens to ichysaur in hl2

so blame valve

Read full topic
item.source: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?

item.title: Bullsquids have eye inside an eye?
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
You can see clearly that an eyeball is inside an eye that the player actually sees. I doubt that this is intended, and it seems bullsquid’s eye position was changed very shortly before release, so that might contribute to this… bug? I saw this on maxed-out video settings.
@EDIT
Now I am thinking that this could be the eye gib that falls from bullsquid (I didn’t gib any bullsquid yet so I’m just guessing that), but nevertheless it looks awkward.
